Usage: apic swiftserver OPTIONS

  Create a Swift Server Generator application

  Options
  -n, --name NAME                  name of the application (optional)

  Stability: prototype

  Create an application named bookshop
  $ apic swiftserver
  ? What's the name of your application? bookshop
  ? Enter name of the directory to contain the project: bookshop
  ? Select the data store: memory

Type "apic COMMAND -h" for help on the following related commands:

  create                           Create artifact definitions
  swiftserver:property             Create a new model property
  swiftserver:refresh              Generate a product and an OpenAPI (Swagger) definition
